title: Strengthening Healthcare Practice Competency: Project-Based Instruction for Chunk-Style Online Language Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can complete over 90% of chunk-style video materials within 2 weeks and summarize key content.
Learners can perform language projects (e.g., creating situational dialogues) with over 80% accuracy in PBL environments using peer feedback and video resources.
Learners register 100% of questions arising during video-based learning in an online forum and resolve them through interaction with peers/instructors.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
